name: Yunni and Nitty
description:
Do you like challenging puzzle games? Do you like playing with a friend? You can do both by playing Yunni and Nitty! Go through 4 different worlds, 12 levels, and infinite fun.

Includes turrets, portals, and even ghosts, spooky.

- 2 Player Game

- Puzzle Game

Controls are explained before the first level. 

Pause (P)
